review: Actualy a pretty nice, minimalist puzzler a la Portal and Q.U.B.E. It's smooth with nice music, although the music transition isn't great. Don't expect a story because there is none, although after you've beaten it, you realise that there was actually a goal for all this.It's a fun, simple, minimalist puzzler that makes no big promises, and yet is pretty fun for the short play-time. It's made by 1 guy and it's free, don't listen to all the crappy negative comments, just enjoy it.
